Text:
Thanks Chillibean for the torrent, I already saw them on tv but I want the rest to download, if you could I would love you.

Heres a steam of the show if you want it to stream, http://www.spacecast.com/toddandthebookofpureevil.aspx.
Cheers dude, any chance of you having the rest of the series? There is no access to it at all where I am from.

The streaming on space doesn't work if you live outside canada.  I've managed to find the first 4 episodes but 5-10 are proving more difficult.  I've tried uploading the first 4 but something's not working.
